name: Pokémon Dragonstone 2
overview: Description: After finishing the first Pokemon Dragonstone, it is the time to play and conquer the world of Pokemon one more time. When you finish dealing with the Pokemon Champion title in the Kohto Region, you will set foot into another Region to answer the mysteries of Dragonstone 1. Your head is filled with questions and they need to be answered. Stronger opponents, more dangerous caves and dungeons, etc.. All the pieces will fit together and make your adventure more interesting and challenging. Features: • More challenging • New story • New soundtrack • New region
